author: dkulp
msg: JAX-RS : adding a thread-local ServletContext handler

author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-1776] Provide Async invokes and callbacks on the low level Client objects.  Get HTTP and JMS transports to support the async replies.   Still need to update the JAX-WS frontend to use it and the JMS transport needs someone to look into it to make sure the changes will actually be acceptable.

author: coheigea
msg: - I also fixed a bug in the patch when is.close() is called on a null inputstream.
- I added a basic unit test as well.
- Albert, can you test this and let me know if it's ok, so that I can close the JIRA?

author: eglynn
msg: Applying patch for CXF-1876 on behalf of David Bosschaert
